name: Frost Giant's Fury
summary: Frost Giant's Fury is a series of Forgotten Realms comic books published by IDW Publishing. It is a direct continuation of the previous series Shadows of the Vampire and Legends of Baldur's Gate, and is itself continued in Evil at Baldur's Gate.
